name: Altrusium Software
body:
### Hi there

It's still very early days for Altrusium Software, but we* are essentially an organisation that builds mobile apps and web solutions for the sole purpose of donating 100% of resulting profits to charities.


_* Currently "we" are a single person. If you're interested in contributing, shoot me a [mail](mailto:altrusium@gmail.com) and I'll keep you posted on development activities._
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
